name: Butterfly Manager
description:
"Butterfly Manager" is 2018 most relaxed "AR" puzzle.Lots of beautiful butterflies and plants.
Easy to learn: plant trees or rotate trees, make butterflies go to the flower.
Hard to master: patience is the key, don't plant a forest.

Key features:
+ Lots of butterflies and lots of plants, they are best for hot summer.
+ Fresh, Original, relaxed and addictive gameplay.
+ "AR" supported.
+ iCloud sync supported.
+ Game Center supported.
